title: The only nerf Hecarim actually deserves would be....
body:
Let us Dodge his E

Because i'll be honest,i could blink or dash miles away and it would still deal damage and push me when i properly time the ability just as he starts the auto animation

and in rare cases even when you interrupt him mid E there's still a chance it hits regardless which is pretty BS

replies.body: I'd also like it if he didn't land it on you while he's snared.  It's disappointing to land a snare on him as he ganks from behind your tower, but be pushed to the center of your lane to die anyways.

Unfortunatly, His E is an empowered AA, and always finish when they're at a certain point in their windup.
Which is why you often still die if you try to flash away from a melee AA last second..
Xin Zhoa for example seems to simply turn ranged when he's AAing you with his Q activated.
It feels like you could flash when he's winding up the second attack, but the knockup still goes through...
